name: Dead by Daylight - A Lullaby for the Dark
name_original: Dead by Daylight - A Lullaby for the Dark
description: A Lullaby for the Dark is a free Chapter for Dead by Daylight. Welcome to the other side of Mother Nature. A disturbing side where survival surpasses cannibalism and ends up in solitude. The Huntress will never miss her mark, she will track you, capture you and kill you. Hopefully a former rugby star might bring her down...
